signature: RTree<T, S> add(Entry<? extends T, ? extends S>)

enhanced_by.reason: The depth of the tree might change after adding an entry, which could affect other operations.

enhanced_by.method_name: delete(Entry<? extends T, ? extends S>, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: Adding an entry might be preceded by a deletion operation to maintain tree integrity.
After adding an entry, the search operation can be used to verify the presence of the added entry.
The minimum bounding rectangle of the tree might change after adding an entry, which can be verified using the mbr method.
